file_content.text: N4 = monitoring jailbreak // Progress = nominal
The stealth troopers and their commanders have been taken care of.
Success = pleasant surprise // N4 = informing strike teams
Your performance = exceeded expectations // Congratulations + gratitude = well deserved
Republic stealth troopers = at large
Contact with Sith Lord = confirmed // N4 = conveying request
Contact with approved Imperial-contracted mercenary = confirmed // N4 = conveying request
Contact with Imperial operative = established // N4 = relaying orders
Contact with Imperial associate = established // N4 = relaying orders
Contact with Imperial-aligned coterie = established // N4 = conveying request
Forcible release of Imperial prisoners = ongoing // Progress = not optimal
Republic stealth troopers = ambushing strike teams // Enemy efficiency = unprecedented
It's a fear tactic. They think they can frighten us off this planet.
They're trying to scare us.
Plan = working // Troop morale = dismal
Let them hide. The dark side perceives all.
Sith are not easily fooled.
Dark side = experimental detection tech?
A few spooks giving you trouble?
Sounds like ghosts.
"Spook" = misleading label // Enemy combatants' composition = flesh + blood
There's no way to counter their stealth technology?
We can't detect them?
Current detection technology = insufficient
You're telling me they're invisible?
Stealth troopers?
Short answer = yes // Long answer = light refraction + sound dampening
Why bother me with this?
Primary targets = stealth troop commanders // Identity + location of commanders = unknown
Request = find + execute stealth commanders // Request = acceptable?
I accept.
With pleasure.
Suggested approach = extract commander location from stealth troopers // Dispatch stealth commanders = next
Go away. [Refuse quest]
N4's persuasiveness = lacking
Imperial strike teams = encountering resistance
